descricao_projeto: The UFSCar Sorocaba TV Box Project aims to decharacterize pirate TV signal receivers ('gatonet') seized by the Receita Federal with the purpose of generating solutions with social impact.
descricao_solucoes: We decharacterized the machines and are developing various solutions for these equipment. Check out the complete repository of the Project.
descricao_wifi: Having issues with your TVBox's Wi-Fi? Check out our solution!
descricao_descaracterizacao: Do you want to remove Android and install Armbian from scratch? Start here!
descricao_hotspot: See how to use the TVBox as a Hotspot.
descricao_capibian: A mini computer with Office functionalities.
